title: HOUSE FOR RENT
posting_body: BEAUTIFUL 4 BEDROOM 3 BATHROOM HOME FOR RENT.
IT IS IN A GREAT LOCATION, HAS A COMFORTABLE LAYOUT WITH SPACIOUS CARPET BEDROOMS & CONCRETE KITCHEN, DINING AND LIVING ROOM FLOORS, PLENTY OF COUNTER AND CABINET SPACE.
EASY 2 CAR GARAGE ACCESS, SPACIOUS YARD, INCLUDES WISHWASHER, GARBAGE, DISPOSAL,MICROWAVE OVEN AND REFRIDGERATOR.
OPEN LIVING ROOM CONCEPT, WASHER AND DRYER ARE NOT SUPPLIED BUT HOOKUPS ARE AVAILABLE INSIDE THE HOME.
CALL TO SCHEDULE A TOUR TODAY.
-$50 Application fee per 18 years or Oder.
-We do a criminal and civil background check
-Has to make 2.5 times the rent and provide proof of income.
